title: Kim Young-mu
text:
Kim Young-Mu (born September 3, 1984) is a South Korean <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player who played for <a href="Daegu%20FC">Daegu FC</a> as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>.
Club career.
Kim was drafted from <a href="Soongsil%20University">Soongsil University</a> for <a href="Daegu%20FC">Daegu FC</a>'s 2007 season. Although <a href="Baek%20Min-Cheol">Baek Min-Cheol</a> was the first choice keeper for <a href="Daegu%20FC">Daegu FC</a>, Kim would play three games in 2007, conceding 11 goals. Kim remained on the roster for the 2008 season, but left the club without playing a game that season.
